stimulusHtml:
Â© Grotte de Niaux, Ariege, Midi-Pyrenees, France Index/Bridgeman Images

The detail of the cave painting shown is visually similar to those found in the Great Hall of the Bulls at Lascaux in that the
choicesHtml: natural curves in the cave wall are used to produce atmospheric perspective
animals are depicted in profile to convey their distinctive qualities
forms are foreshortened to present a sense of animals in motion
limited color palette is intended to focus attention on the narrative
